TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventLogTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogTraceListener Inherits TraceListener
public ref class EventLogTraceListener sealed : System::Diagnostics::TraceListener

summary.span: 提供簡單的接聽程式，將追蹤或偵錯輸出導向到 。

span.span: Provides a simple listener that directs tracing or debugging output to an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個執行個體可以加入至， ，或集合，以便從追蹤或偵錯，以傳送輸出。An instance of this can be added to the , , or collections to send output from tracing or debugging to an . 您可以在程式碼中新增執行個體，或在應用程式組態檔中指定它。You can add the instance in your code or specify it in the application configuration file. 若要加入使用應用程式組態檔，來對應至您的應用程式名稱的檔案或 app.config 檔案中的編輯[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]專案。To add an using an application configuration file, edit the file that corresponds to the name of your application or the app.config file in a [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] project. 在此檔案中，插入的項目型別。In this file, insert an element for a type. 下列範例會將名為物件`myListener`至集合。The following example adds a object named `myListener` to the collection. `initializeData`參數會指定要傳遞至事件記錄檔來源名稱建構函式。The `initializeData` parameter specifies the name of the event log source that is to be passed to the constructor. ``` ``` 如需如何在應用程式組態檔中加入追蹤接聽程式的詳細資訊，請參閱或。For more information about how to add trace listeners in the application configuration file, see or . > [!NOTE] > 如果事件記錄檔相關聯執行個體不存在，會建立新的事件來源。If the for the event log that is associated with the instance does not exist, a new event source is created. 若要在 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional 或 Windows Server 2003 中建立事件來源，您必須具有系統管理權限。To create an event source in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional, or Windows Server 2003, you must have administrative privileges. > > 這項需求的原因是，必須搜尋所有的事件記錄檔，包括安全性、 以判斷事件來源是否為唯一。The reason for this requirement is that all event logs, including security, must be searched to determine whether the event source is unique. 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者沒有權限來存取安全性記錄檔中。因此，就會擲回。In Windows Vista, users do not have permission to access the security log; therefore, a is thrown. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼存取安全性記錄檔，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses the security log, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 這個類別會提供屬性來取得或設定接收追蹤或偵錯輸出中，事件記錄檔和屬性來保留名稱。The class provides the property to get or set the event log that receives the tracing or debugging output, and the property to hold the name of the . 方法會關閉事件記錄檔，所以它不再接收追蹤或偵錯輸出。The method closes the event log so it no longer receives tracing or debugging output. 和方法會將訊息寫入事件記錄檔。The and methods write a message to the event log. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免事件記錄檔寫入大量資料的可能性不會輸出所指定的選擇性追蹤資料屬性。To avoid the possibility of writing large amounts of data to the event log, the does not output the optional trace data specified by the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立追蹤接聽程式將輸出傳送至事件記錄檔。The following example creates a trace listener that sends output to an event log. 首先，程式碼會建立新使用來源`myEventLogSource`。First, the code creates a new that uses the source `myEventLogSource`. 下一步`myTraceListener`加入至集合。Next, `myTraceListener` is added to the collection. 最後，範例會傳送至輸出行物件。Finally, the example sends a line of output to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic EventLogTraceListener Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic EventLogTraceListener Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不適合由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 進行呼叫的方法時， ，和輸出追蹤資料的類別。They are called by methods of the , , and classes to output trace data. 方法、 like方法適用於自動化工具，但也可讓附加其他物件，例如例外狀況執行個體，來追蹤。The method, like the method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace. `eventCache`和`source`參數可用來判斷是否應追蹤的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用來建立物件和等同於至如屬性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 寫入事件記錄檔與`data`物件，格式化為字串，使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `data` object, formatted as a string, using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`參數為 65,535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535、 使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

span.span: is not specified.
-or-

exception.span: 記錄項目字串超過 32,766 個字元。

span.span: The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不適合由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 進行呼叫的方法時， ，和輸出追蹤資料的類別。They are called by methods of the , , and classes to output trace data. 方法、 like方法適用於自動化工具，但也可讓附加其他物件，例如例外狀況執行個體，來追蹤。The method, like the method is intended for automated tools but also allows the attaching of additional objects, for example an exception instance, to the trace. `severity`和`id`參數資料用來建立物件，從資料物件的陣列寫入事件記錄檔的資料。The `severity` and `id` parameter data is used to create an object, which is written to the event log with the data from the array of data objects. `eventCache`和`source`參數可用來判斷是否應追蹤的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用來建立物件和等同於至如屬性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 寫入事件記錄檔與`data`物件陣列，格式為字串陣列，使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `data` object array, formatted as a string array, using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`參數為 65,535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535、 使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不適合由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 方法會呼叫這些方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。These methods are called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data. 方法的目的在於工具可以自動處理的追蹤事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如監視工具可以通知系統管理員，如果特定的事件會由特定來源進行追蹤。For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. `eventCache`和`source`參數可用來判斷是否應追蹤的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用來建立物件和等同於至如屬性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 寫入事件記錄檔與`message`資料使用方法。The is written to the event log with the `message` data using the method. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`參數為 65,535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535、 使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

span.span: is not specified.
-or-

span.span: The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不適合由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The methods are not intended to be called by application code. 方法會呼叫這些方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。These methods are called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data. 方法的目的在於工具可以自動處理的追蹤事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如監視工具可以通知系統管理員，如果特定的事件會由特定來源進行追蹤。For example a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. `eventCache`和`source`參數可用來判斷是否應追蹤的事件。The `eventCache` and `source` parameters are used to determine if the event should be traced. `id` 用來建立物件和等同於至如屬性。`id` is used to create an object and the is equated to an for the property. 寫入事件記錄檔中，使用方法，並從取得的訊息有`format`和`args`參數。The is written to the event log, using the method, with the message obtained from the `format` and `args` parameters. `args`物件陣列會轉換成字串，使用方法，傳遞`format`字串和`args`要做為事件記錄檔的訊息格式的字串陣列。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message for the event log. > [!NOTE] > 最大值`id`參數為 65,535。The maximum value of the `id` parameter is 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值大於 65,535、 使用的最大值。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the maximum value is used.

span.span: is not specified.
-or-

exception.span: 記錄項目字串超過 32,766 個字元。

span.span: The log entry string exceeds 32,766 characters.

param.name: message
param.span: 要寫入的訊息。

span.span: The message to write.

summary.span: 將訊息寫入這個執行個體的事件記錄檔。

span.span: Writes a message to the event log for this instance.
exceeds 32,766 characters.
